```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)

set.seed(1)
```

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

```

write a function to compute z scores

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}

z_scores(x_vec)
```
